name: Collect the 14 beans on the roof in the Bean Bonus Room
Activate a potion cauldron with a gnome
Walk up the stairs to Girl's Dormitory in Slytherin
Take no damage in the Basilisk fight
Complete Willow without using the mouse
Get the 16 beans on Lockhart's balcony
Cut all Venomous Tentacula heads off in Boomslang
Spawn 12 gnomes in the girl's bathroom
Lose a Quidditch match by 250 points
Hit all of the ropes in the Aragog fight
Hit 8 different Lumos statues in Goyle
Activate both secrets in Willow from out of bounds
